00010 class CStringVector : public std::vector<CString> 
00011 {
00012 public:
00013   CString Merge() { CString tmp; for(UINT i=0; i< size(); i++) tmp+=at(i);  return tmp; }
00014   CString ToString() { CString tmp; for(UINT i=0; i< size(); i++) tmp+=at(i)+CString("\n");  return tmp; }
00015   static CStringVector Tokenize(CString str, CString tokens, int bSave=0)
00016   {
00017     CString resToken;
00018     int curPos= 0;
00019     CStringVector strs;
00020 
00021     resToken= str.Tokenize(tokens,curPos);
00022     while (resToken != "")
00023     {
00024       strs.push_back((!bSave) ? resToken: resToken+str[curPos-1]);  
00025       resToken= str.Tokenize(tokens,curPos);
00026     };
00027     return strs;
00028   }
00029 };

00031 #include <sstream>
00032 template< class T, class W=T >
00033 struct Array1D  : public std::vector<T> 
00034 {
00035   void Reserve(UINT size)
00036   {
00037     this->resize(size);
00038   }
00039   void Load(UINT n, ...)
00040   {
00041     clear();
00042     va_list ap; 
00043     va_start(ap,n); 
00044     for(int i=0; i< n; i++)
00045     {
00046       T t = va_arg ( ap, W );
00047       push_back(t);
00048     }
00049     va_end(ap);
00050   }
00051   CString ToString() 
00052   {
00053     USES_CONVERSION;
00054     std::stringstream str;
00055     for(UINT i=0; i< size(); i++)
00056       str<< at(i) << _T(",");
00057     str<< endl;
00058     std::string cstr;
00059     str>>cstr;
00060 
00061     return A2T((LPSTR) cstr.c_str());
00062 
00063   }
00064 
00065 };
00066 
00067 typedef Array1D<int>    CIntArray;
00068 typedef Array1D<float, double>  FloatList;

00070 template< class T >
00071 struct Array2D  : public std::vector<std::vector<T> >
00072 {
00073   int rows, cols;
00074   void Reserve(UINT rows, UINT cols)
00075   {
00076     this->rows=rows; this->cols=cols;
00077     this->resize(rows);
00078     for(UINT i=0; i<rows; i++) 
00079       this->at(i).resize(cols);
00080   }
00081   Array2D<T>   Transpose()
00082   {
00083     Array2D<T>   tmp;
00084     int rows = this->size();
00085     int cols = (rows>0)? this->at(0).size() : 0;
00086     if(rows <1 && cols < 1)
00087       return tmp;
00088     tmp.resize(cols);
00089     for(UINT i=0; i<cols; i++) 
00090     {
00091       tmp.at(i).resize(rows);
00092       for(UINT j=0; j<rows; j++)
00093         tmp[i][j]=this->at(j).at(i);
00094 
00095     }
00096     return tmp;
00097   }
00098   CString ToString()
00099   {
00100     CString str;
00101     Array2D<T> & tmp(*this);
00102     for(UINT i=0; i<tmp.size(); i++) 
00103     {
00104       for(UINT j=0; j<tmp[i].size(); j++)
00105       {
00106         str.AppendFormat("[%d][%d]=%9.5f %9.5f %9.5f %9.5f\n", i,j, tmp[i][j].x, tmp[i][j].y, tmp[i][j].z, tmp[i][j].w);
00107       }
00108 
00109     }
00110     return str;
00111   }
00112 
00113 };
00114 typedef CStringVector::iterator CStringVectorIterator;

00117 enum type_enum {
00118   unknown_ = 0, /* 0 catches uninit. errors */
00119   special_, /* placeholder, given meaning by it's owner, */
00120   /* such as Type_Dont_Care, Type_Bad, Type_User_Def */
00121   runtime_, /* cannot be further determined until runtime */
00122   integer_,
00123   real_,
00124   string_,
00125   binary_,
00126   boolean_,
00127   logical_,
00128 
00129   /* formals-only */
00130   number_,
00131   generic_,
00132 
00133   /* aggregates */
00134   aggregate_, /* as a formal */
00135   array_,
00136   bag_,
00137   set_,
00138   list_,
00139   last_aggregate_,/* not real, just for easier computation */
00140 
00141   oneof_,
00142 
00143   /* while they are really used for different */
00144   /* purposes, it might be worth considering */
00145   /* collapsing entity_ and entity_list_ */
00146   entity_,  /* single entity */
00147   entity_list_, /* linked list of entities */
00148   enumeration_,
00149   select_,
00150   reference_, /* something only defined by a base type, i.e., a */
00151   /* type reference */
00152   query_,
00153   op_,    /* something with an operand */
00154   inverse_, /* is? an inverse */
00155 
00156   identifier_,  /* simple identifier in an expression */
00157   attribute_, /* attribute reference (i.e., expr->u.variable) */
00158   derived_,/*?*/
00159   funcall_, /* a function call and actual parameters */
00160 
00161   hollerith_, /* quirky- a hollerith string */
00162   arrayint1D_,
00163 
00164   self_
00165 };
00166 #endif

00186 struct ColorMap
00187 {
00188   ColorMap(float red=0, float green=0, float blue=0) { SetColor(red, green,  blue);}
00189   ColorMap(COLORREF rgb)  { SetColor(rgb); }
00190   void SetColor(float red, float green, float blue) { this->red=red; this->green=green; this->blue= blue;}
00191   void SetColor(COLORREF rgb)
00192   {
00193     red=float(GetRValue(rgb))/255.0;
00194     green=float(GetGValue(rgb))/255.0;
00195     blue=float(GetBValue(rgb))/255.0;
00196   }
00197   float * GetColor(){ return &this->red; }
00198   operator  COLORREF(){ COLORREF rgb = RGB ((short) (red*255) ,(short) (green*255),(short) (blue*255)); return rgb;}
00200   float red, green, blue;
00201 
00202 };

00215 struct CVarDef;

00217 
00218 struct CVarDef
00219 {
00220   CString m_sName;
00221   CString m_sClassname;
00222   type_enum m_eType;
00223   DWORD m_ref;
00224   CVarDefs * m_optBaseClassVars;
00225   type_enum m_eListType;
00226   bool m_bOptional;
00227   DWORD m_NRef;
00228 
00229   CVarDef(CString name=_T(""), type_enum type=unknown_, DWORD ref=0, CString sClassname=_T(""), bool bOptional=false)
00230   { 
00231     Init(name,  type,  ref, sClassname,  bOptional);
00232   } 
00233   CVarDef(CString name,  DWORD ref, CString sClassname, type_enum type, ...)
00234   { 
00235     Init(name,  type,  ref, sClassname,  false);
00236     va_list ap;
00237     va_start(ap, type);
00238     switch(type)
00239     {
00240     case arrayint1D_:
00241       {
00242         m_NRef=va_arg ( ap, DWORD );
00243       }
00244     }
00245     va_end(ap);
00246   } 
00247   void Init(CString name=_T(""), type_enum type=unknown_, DWORD ref=0, CString sClassname=_T(""), bool bOptional=false)
00248   { 
00249     this->m_sName=name; 
00250     this->m_eType=type; 
00251     this->m_ref=ref; 
00252     this->m_optBaseClassVars=NULL;
00253     this->m_eListType=unknown_;
00254     this->m_sClassname=sClassname;
00255     m_bOptional=bOptional;
00256   } 
00257 
00258   static DWORD Find(std::vector<CVarDef> vars, CString name)
00259   {
00260     for(int i=0; i<vars.size(); i++)
00261       if(vars[i].m_sName==name) return vars[i].m_ref;
00262 
00263     return NULL;
00264   }
00265   static CString Hollerith(CString str) { return StrFormat("%dH%s", str.GetLength(), str); }
00266   static CString DeHollerith(CString str){ 
00267     return str.Mid(str.Find("H")+1); }
00268 
00269 
00270   HRESULT Store (CString str)
00271   {
00272     switch(m_eType)
00273     {
00274     case integer_ :
00275       {
00276         int * pInt = (int *) m_ref;
00277         *pInt= atoi(str);
00278       }
00279       break;
00280     case real_ :
00281       {
00282         float * pFloat = (float *) m_ref;
00283         *pFloat= atof(str);
00284         if(errno==EINVAL)
00285           return E_FAIL;
00286       }
00287       break;
00288     case string_ :
00289       {
00290         CString * pStr = (CString *) m_ref;
00291         *pStr= str;
00292       }
00293       break;
00294       break;
00295     case hollerith_ :
00296       {
00297         CString * pStr = (CString *) m_ref;
00298         *pStr= DeHollerith(str);
00299       }
00300       break;  
00301     }
00302     
00303     return S_OK;
00304   }
00305   CString Write ()
00306   {
00307     CString str;
00308     switch(m_eType)
00309     {
00310     case integer_ :
00311       {
00312         int * pInt = (int *) m_ref;
00313         return StrFormat("%d", *pInt); 
00314       }
00315       break;
00316     case real_ :
00317       {
00318         float * pFloat = (float *) m_ref;
00319         return StrFormat("%g", *pFloat); 
00320       }
00321       break;
00322     case string_ :
00323       {
00324         CString * pStr = (CString *) m_ref;
00325         return StrFormat("%s", *pStr); 
00326       }
00327       break;
00328     case hollerith_ :
00329       {
00330         CString * pStr = (CString *) m_ref;
00331         return Hollerith(StrFormat("%s", *pStr)); 
00332       }
00333     }
00334     return str;
00335   }
00336 };
00337 
00338 #endif
00339 template<class T>
00340 struct SetType
00341 {
00342   int min;   // e.g., 0 or 1
00343   int max;  // -1 infinite
00344   CString m_sName;
00345   CString m_sType;
00346   CString m_sReferenceChain;
00347   bool m_bOptional;
00348   std::vector<T> items;
00349   SetType<T>(CString name, CString type, CString parent=_T(""), bool bOptional=true, int min=1, int max=-1)
00350   {
00351     this-> min=min;   // e.g., 0 or 1
00352     this->max=max;  // -1 infinite
00353     this->m_sName=name;
00354     this->m_sType=type;
00355     this->m_sReferenceChain=parent;
00356     this->m_bOptional=bOptional;
00357   }
00358 
00359 };
